full_title: CAST IRON Kettlebell 6kg, Cast Iron Kettle Bell Weight for Strength Training, Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Workouts

reasoning.keyword_integration: Prioritized high-volume keywords: 'kettlebell', '6kg', 'kettle bell', 'weights', 'gym equipment', 'home gym', 'strength training', 'fitness'. Used 'CAST IRON' as brand from verified facts and repeated 'cast iron' as material descriptor. Structured title to read as a natural product description while embedding search terms seamlessly.
